title: Membership in federal home loan bank
context: ยง412:7-202 Membership in federal home loan bank. Any savings and loan association may become a member of a federal home loan bank organized under authority of the Federal Home Loan Bank Act, or any successor or similar system of federal home loan banks established by Congress, and may purchase and hold the shares of such federal home loan bank. The savings and loan association may have and exercise all powers not in conflict with the laws of this State incident to such membership; provided, however that notwithstanding such membership the savings and loan association and its directors, officers, and shareholders shall continue to be subject to all liabilities and duties imposed upon them by any law of this State. [L 1993, c 350, pt of ยง1]
